locations.name: Bogota
locations.description: Colombia's high-altitude capital, featuring the historic La Candelaria district and rich cultural attractions.

locations.name: Medellin
locations.description: Known as the 'City of Eternal Spring,' celebrated for its urban transformation and proximity to coffee regions.

locations.name: Cartagena
locations.description: A vibrant port city on Colombia's Caribbean coast with a UNESCO-listed walled Old Town.

locations.name: Quito
locations.description: Ecuador's capital high in the Andes, boasting a well-preserved colonial center (UNESCO World Heritage site).

locations.name: Galapagos Islands
locations.description: A unique volcanic archipelago famous for its fearless wildlife and contribution to the theory of evolution. Coordinates represent a central point near Santa Cruz Island.
